snippet.title: Way of Retribution - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle is a challenge? No it's a way of life... Plunge into the hostile world of Way of Retribution.
** Gameplay features**
-Seamless world, full of hostile creatures. But there be places to improve equipment, replenishment of supplies.
-Every encounter with the enemy is a challenge.
-Freedom of fight system, lockable target.
-Appearance editor, starting sets depending on the selected class.
-Flexible character development, a huge number of weapons, equipment and skills, the complex is organized a unique character class, with any bias.
********************************
Play Market - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lib.wrlive
********************************
©2019 LIB All Rights Reserved.
